item.title: JackAudio Setup for NI3 Dance
item.description: A post that describes NI3 Dance's live software setup: All free and open-source software, MIDI and Audio routed with Jack.

item.title: Couple Of Pipewire Hacks
item.description: Finding very few blog posts about making music in the Pipewire era. So, here are a couple of things I found since upgrading.
